'''Large Fan Blades''' are an exploration mechanic in [[Great Red Sand]], [[Sumeru]] found in the Ruins of King Deshret.

They can be positioned horizontally or vertically. Vertically placed Large Fan Blades can be used as [[Wind Current]]s.

Large Fan Blades can blow [[Primal Ember]]s away. They may turn on and off in an interval or be controlled by a [[Plinth of the Secret Rites]].
